DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single dose lasmiditan healthy subject .
DOC.detailed_description: An open-label , cross-over , two-period , randomize , sequential study order investigate effect food pharmacokinetics lasmiditan 200 mg. Two single dos lasmiditan administer subject feed fasted state .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1850 year . Able willing give write informed consent . Females child bear potential must use willing use medically acceptable method ( defined Investigator ) birth control . BMI within 19 29.9 kg/m2 . No clinically significant abnormality ( determine Principal Investigator ) hematology , blood chemistry urinalysis lab test screen . No history alcohol drug abuse within past year . Negative urinary drug abuse alcohol screen determine within 21 day start study checkin Day 1 . Must able understand requirement study must willing comply requirement study . Any medical condition clinical laboratory test judgment Investigator make subject unsuitable study . Pregnant breastfeed woman . Use prescription within 14 day prior dose ( except hormonal contraceptive ) thecounter medication , include vitamin herbal dietary supplement within 7 day prior dose unless approve Investigator Medical Monitor . . History within previous 3 year current evidence abuse drug , prescription illicit , alcohol ; positive urine screen drug abuse alcohol . History orthostatic hypotension without syncope . At imminent risk suicide ( positive response question 4 5 CSSRS ) suicide attempt within 6 month prior screen visit . Participation clinical trial experimental drug device previous 30 day . Positive Hepatitis C antibody , Hepatitis B surface antigen , positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody . Donated plasma 7 day blood 3 month precede study drug administration . Inability communicate well Investigator study staff ( i.e. , language problem , poor mental development impair cerebral function ) . Inability fast consume food provide study . Relatives , staff directly reporting , Investigator .
